select tfb.id as id, tfb.name as name, tfb.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, tfb.PLAN_ACCOUNT as planAccount, tfb.ACCOUNT_YES as accountYes, tfb.APR as apr, tfb.STATUS as status, (case when tfb.END_TIME <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tfb.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 22:30:00') then CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tfb.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 22:30:00') else DATE_ADD(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tfb.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 22:30:00'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) end) as endTime, tfb.LOCK_LIMIT as lockLimit, tfb.LOWEST_ACCOUNT as lowestAccount, tfb.MOST_ACCOUNT as mostAccount, tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME as lockEndtime, tfb.PUBLISH_TIME as publishTime, DATEDIFF(tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME,now()) as endDays, (select INTEREST from t_fix_repaymentrecord r where r.FIX_BORROW_ID= #{id}) as sumInterest, tfb.AREA_TYPE as areaType, tfb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME as areaChangeTime, tfb.BID_PASSWORD as bidPassword, tfb.SUCCESS_TIME as successTime from t_fix_borrow tfb where tfb.id = #{id}

select IFNULL(sum(account),0) as account,lock_limit from ( select IFNULL(SUM(account),0) as account,lock_limit from t_fix_tender_detail tender join t_fix_borrow borrow on tender.FIX_BORROW_ID = borrow.id where tender.STATUS IN (0, 1) and tender.user_id = #{userId} group by LOCK_LIMIT union all select IFNULL(sum(INTEREST),0) as account ,lock_limit from t_fix_collectionrecord record join t_fix_borrow borrow on record.FIX_BORROW_ID = borrow.ID where record.STATUS = '0' AND USER_ID = #{userId} group by LOCK_LIMIT )fix group by lock_limit

select sum(tempf.jrz) jrz, sum(tempf.syz) syz, sum(tempf.ytc) ytc from ( select count(1) jrz,'' syz,''ytc from t_fix_borrow tfb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id,fix_borrow_id from t_fix_tender_detail b GROUP BY user_id,fix_borrow_id ) tft on (tfb.id = tft.fix_borrow_id) where tft.USER_ID=#{userId} and tfb.STATUS=3
union all select '',count(1),'' from ( SELECT tfb.name from t_fix_tender_real tft,t_fix_borrow tfb where tft.FIX_BORROW_ID = tfb.ID and tft.STATUS ='0' and tft.USER_ID=#{userId} ) as tempa union all select '','',count(1) from ( SELECT ftb.name from t_fix_tender_real tft,t_fix_borrow ftb where tft.FIX_BORROW_ID = ftb.ID and tft.STATUS ='1' and tft.USER_ID=#{userId} ) as tempb )as tempf

select tfb.id as id, tfb.name as name, tfb.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, tfb.PLAN_ACCOUNT as planAccount, tfb.ACCOUNT_YES as accountYes, tfb.APR as apr, tfb.STATUS as status, (case when tfb.END_TIME <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tfb.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 22:30:00') then CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tfb.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 22:30:00') else DATE_ADD(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tfb.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 22:30:00'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) end) as endTime, tfb.LOCK_LIMIT as lockLimit, tfb.LOWEST_ACCOUNT as lowestAccount, tfb.MOST_ACCOUNT as mostAccount, tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME as lockEndtime, tfb.PUBLISH_TIME as publishTime, DATEDIFF(tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME,now()) as endDays, (select INTEREST from t_fix_repaymentrecord r where r.FIX_BORROW_ID= #{id}) as sumInterest, tfb.AREA_TYPE as areaType, tfb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME as areaChangeTime, tfb.BID_PASSWORD as bidPassword, tfb.SUCCESS_TIME as successTime from t_fix_borrow tfb where tfb.id = #{id} for update
mapper.update: update t_fix_borrow set ACCOUNT_YES = IFNULL(ACCOUNT_YES,0) + #{account}, TENDER_TIMES = IFNULL(TENDER_TIMES,0) + 1 where id = #{fixBorrowId}

update t_fix_borrow
STATUS = #{status},
SUCCESS_TIME = now(),
LOCK_ENDTIME = DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL LOCK_LIMIT MONTH),INTERVAL 1 DAY),
where id=#{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rocky_mail_send_record ( type_id, TYPE, STATUS , ADDTIME, email, user_id ) SELECT tmp.FIX_BORROW_ID, tmp.type, tmp.`status`, tmp.addtime, tmp.EMAIL, tmp.userid FROM( SELECT tendreal.FIX_BORROW_ID, 6 as type, 0 as 'status', NOW() as addtime, member.EMAIL, member.id as userid FROM t_fix_tender_real tendreal,rocky_member member WHERE tendreal.USER_ID = member.id AND tendreal.FIX_BORROW_ID = #{fixBorrowId} GROUP BY tendreal.user_id ) AS tmp

mapper.select: SELECT ,fa.USE_MONEY as fixAccountUserMoney ,fa.CAPITAL FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow INNER JOIN t_fix_account fa ON fixBorrow.ID = fa.FIX_BORROW_ID WHERE fixBorrow.`STATUS` = 5 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt WHERE rbt.USER_ID = fixBorrow.ID AND rbt.`STATUS` = 0 LIMIT 0,1) AND LOCK_ENDTIME <= CURDATE() AND fa.USE_MONEY < fa.CAPITAL AND fa.COLLECTION > 0 AND fixBorrow.ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE;

select (@rnTmp := @rnTmp + 1), if(@tmp = invertTotal, @rn := @rn, @rn := @rnTmp) numberNo, mid, username, invertTotal, (@tmp := invertTotal), tenderTIME from ( select m.ID mid, m.USERNAME, sum(ACCOUNT) invertTotal, MAX(t.ADDTIME) tenderTIME from rocky_member m inner join ( select td.USER_ID, sum(td.ACCOUNT) ACCOUNT,MAX(td.ADDTIME) ADDTIME from t_fix_tender_detail td INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fix on td.FIX_BORROW_ID=fix.ID where td.`STATUS` in(1,3) and td.ADDTIME >= DATE('2015-11-11') and td.ADDTIME < DATE('2015-12-01') and fix.SUCCESS_TIME >= DATE('2015-11-11') and fix.SUCCESS_TIME < DATE('2015-12-01') and fix.LOCK_LIMIT = #{lockLimit} group by td.USER_ID ) t on t.USER_ID = m.ID and t.ACCOUNT > 0 where m.USERNAME not in ('顶玺金融') and m.`STATUS` = 0 and m.IS_FINANCIAL_USER = 1 group by m.ID ) t, (select @rn := 0) x, (select @rnTmp := 0) y, (select @tmp := 0) z order by invertTotal desc,tenderTIME ASC limit 0, 10

SELECT SUM(num) from ( SELECT COUNT(*) as num from t_fix_tender_detail s INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow t on s.FIX_BORROW_ID=t.ID where s.`STATUS` in(0,1,3) and s.USER_ID = #{userId} and AREA_TYPE=1 UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) as num from t_fix_tender_detail s INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow t on s.FIX_BORROW_ID=t.ID where s.`STATUS` in(0,1,3) and s.USER_ID = #{userId} and t.AREA_TYPE=0 and t.AREA_CHANGE_TIME IS NOT NULL and s.ADDTIME<t.AREA_CHANGE_TIME ) t2

select m.ID mid, m.username username, rma.MOBILENUM mobile, FROM_UNIXTIME(m.ADDTIME) regTime from rocky_member m INNER JOIN ( select td.USER_ID, sum(td.ACCOUNT) ACCOUNT from t_fix_tender_detail td INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fix on td.FIX_BORROW_ID=fix.ID where td.`STATUS` in(1,3) and DATE_FORMAT(td.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(fix.SUCCESS_TIME,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m') and td.ADDTIME >= DATE('2016-02-01') and fix.SUCCESS_TIME >= DATE('2016-02-01') group by td.USER_ID ) t on t.USER_ID = m.ID INNER JOIN rocky_mobile_appro rma on m.ID=rma.USER_ID where m.USERNAME not in ('顶玺金融') and m.`STATUS` = 0 and m.IS_FINANCIAL_USER = 1 and m.INVITERID=#{userId} and t.ACCOUNT>=10000 and FROM_UNIXTIME(m.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m') and FROM_UNIXTIME(m.ADDTIME)>=DATE('2016-02-01')
